name: Unstable ground (Gamepopper)
description:
Physics-based city builder where you manage a small city on a large mound of earth that could topple at any given moment.

Every city must start with a power plant, a house, and a shop. After that, you will be given other buildings that can get more people into your city,  and prevent the population from going down.

But whatever you do, try not to get the whole place to fall over for as long as possible, especially when the weather can blow it in one direction.

This game requires the mouse. Left-clicking will select, grab, and place buildings while right-clicking will remove buildings. Even the menu will use the mouse controls!

Made for Ludum Dare 49.
